segments.text: Looking at this, I feel a pang of worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so engrossed in her task, plate gleaming under the light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the faucet runs unchecked, flooding the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours onto the floor, soaking her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious to the danger at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids, though, are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the teetering stool, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could topple any moment, hurting him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, part of the scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, calm garden contrasts the turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she'd notice and intervene.
segments.speaker: PAR
